key.name: switchinterval
key.description: Time - in seconds - between wallpaper changes

key.name: runwallstreet
key.description: Whether WallStreet should run. When ticked, WallStreet also autostarts on logon

key.name: random
key.description: Whether to use random wallpapers from the set directory or not

key.name: lockscreensync
key.description: Whether WallStreet should also set the wallpaper for lockscreen

key.name: wallpaperfolder
key.description: The default folder that WallStreet should use to find the wallpapers

key.name: fallbackwallpaper
key.summary: The backround to set in case of an errors
key.description: In case there are no files in the used folder, a fallback image will be used
